libEndpointSecurity(3) Library Functions Manual libEndpointSecurity(3)

NAME

libEndpointSecurity — Library used to interact with the EndpointSecurity subsystem

DESCRIPTION

libEndpointSecurity Exports interfaces allowing EndpointSecurity clients to interact with the EndpointSecurity subsystem, including operations like subscribing to system events and responding to events that require authorization.

SEE ALSO

EndpointSecurity(7), endpointsecurityd(8)
